description.full: The makers of the award-winning GTR and GT Legends bring real GT racing to the Xbox 360. Featuring all the cars, drivers and tracks from two full FIA GT Championships, GTR makes professional drivers out of casual racers. Do it for real!
description.short: The makers of the award-winning GTR and GT Legends bring real GT racing to the Xbox 360. Featuring all the cars, drivers and tracks from two full FIA GT Championships, GTR makes professional drivers out of casual racers. Do it for real!
